title: Americans sour on Trump's handling of the economy, Reuters/Ipsos poll finds
shortDescription: Americans elected Trump in hopes that he would fight inflation and boost the U.S. economy, but they are giving him poor marks for both, a new poll shows.

title: Trump's latest orders address HBCUs, school discipline, foreign gifts
shortDescription: President Donald Trump issued seven orders on April 23, calling for changes related to AI, HBCUs, school discipline, foreign gifts and accreditation.

title: 12 Democratic states sue Trump over international tariffs
shortDescription: President Trump argues his tough tariff approach is forcing countries to renegotiate their trade deals with the United States.

title: Trump rejects raising taxes on millionaires
shortDescription: President Donald Trump rejected the possibility of raising taxes on millionaires, arguing the policy could prompt them to leave the country.

title: Trump's approval rating slips further in new Economist/YouGov poll
shortDescription: The latest poll from The Economist/YouGov showed 41% of respondents approved of Trump's job, compared to 54% who disapproved.

title: Trump signs executive order to boost AI in K-12 schools
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signed an executive order Wednesday directing the secretary of education to prioritize AI-related teacher training grants.

title: These Democrats are taking their fight straight to GOP districts
shortDescription: Democrats like Ro Khanna, Bernie Sanders and AOC are traveling the country, as the party looks to bounce back.

title: Sen. Dick Durbin says he's not seeking re-election
shortDescription: Durbin, a key figure in the Democratic caucus, has made his mark in Congress, notably endorsing Barack Obama early in the historical 2008 presidential campaign.

title: Trump plans 100-foot flag poles at White House
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has his eyes set on "two beautiful poles" to display the American flag on the White House grounds.

title: Trump seeks 'fair deal' with China as he softens tone on tariffs
shortDescription: President Trump vowed his administration will reach a "fair deal" with China on trade as he floats substantially reducing tariffs on Beijing.

title: Trump has lost trust on the economy as 100 days nears
shortDescription: Most Americans now express opposition to Trump's tariffs and little confidence in his economic leadership, a shift since the election.

title: Illinois Sen. Dick Durbin announces he won’t seek reelection
shortDescription: Dick Durbin, the 80-year-old longtime No. 2 Democrat in Senate, won’t seek reelection in Illinois.

title: Congressional Democrats meet with Mahmoud Khalil, Rumeysa Ozturk
shortDescription: Five Democrats traveled to Louisiana on Tuesday to visit the ICE facilities where Mahmoud Khalil and Rumeysa Ozturk have been held custody.

title: Trump suggests China tariffs will decrease
shortDescription: President Donald Trump suggested the China tariffs will "come down substantially."

title: Iowa's next governor? Why these Republicans might run — or take a pass
shortDescription: Republicans across the state are debating both whether they have a viable path to the nomination and whether they want to take it. Here's who.

title: Who's attending Pope Francis' funeral? Trump, Prince William, Zelenksy
shortDescription: President Donald Trump will be among the world leaders attending the funeral of Pope Francis set for Saturday Saturday, April 26 in Rome.

title: Trump says tariffs on China will 'come down substantially'
shortDescription: President Trump said 145% tariffs on Chinese imports will "come down substantially" as his administration expressed optimism about a trade deal.

title: Trump says 'no intention of firing' Fed Chairman Jerome Powell
shortDescription: President Donald Trump had criticized Fed Chairman Jerome Powell as 'a major loser,' but he has 'no intention of firing him.'
